bookTitle: The Game of Life and How to Play It
Plot: With her classic book, THE GAME OF LIFE AND HOW TO PLAY IT , Florence Scovel Shinn established herself as one of the most down-to-earth, practical, and helpful prosperity writers of her era. With a timeless message and the ability to explain success principles and how they work in an entertaining style, her writings are still considered the leaders in prosperity literature today.
